WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome!
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: We are glad to see you in our application.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: The application provides help in solving mathematical problems
ABOUT.SOURCELINK: The app is free for personal use and open source at the link:

CONTACT.TITLE: Contacts
CONTACT.EMAIL: Please contact us by email if you have any questions:

START.TITLE: Try our app
START.DESCRIPTION: The first attempt per day is free for users without authorization.

HOME.LOREM: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry...

LINE.CHANGE_LENGTH: Change the length of the selected line

FIGURE.SELECT_LINE: Select a line within the figure
FIGURE.SELECT_ANGLE: Select an angle within the figure

TRIANGLE.DRAWHEIGHT: Draw the height of the triangle
TRIANGLE.DRAWMEDIAN: Draw the median of the triangle
TRIANGLE.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the triangle

ELLIPSE.DRAWRADIUS: Draw the radius of the ellipse
ELLIPSE.DRAWDIAMETER: Draw the diameter of the ellipse

RECTANGLE.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the rectangle

RHOMBUS.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the rhombus
RHOMBUS.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the rhombus

TRAPEZOID.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the trapezoid
TRAPEZOID.DRAWMIDLINE: Draw the midline of the trapezoid
TRAPEZOID.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the trapezoid

PARALLELOGRAM.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the parallelogram
PARALLELOGRAM.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the parallelogram

POLYGON.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the polygon

ERRORS.INVALID_SIDES_NUMBER: Invalid number of sides. The value must be an integer greater than or equal to 3.

LENGTH.INCORRECT: Invalid line length. Only numbers, 'x', 'y', or '?' are allowed.

ERROR.TITLE: Error
ERROR.NOT_AUTHORIZED: Authorization is required to rate the solution.
ERROR.UNKNOWN: An unknown error occurred. Try again later.
ERROR.NOT_TASK_CREATOR: Only the task creator can rate this solution.
ERROR.UNAUTHORIZED: Authorization error on the server side. Please try again later.

WARNING.TITLE: Warning
WARNING.RATED: Rating can only be submitted once.

PLACEHOLDER.EDIT_DISABLED: Editing LaTeX code is disabled until all empty fields are filled

EDIT_MODE.ALERT:
Placeholder editing mode is enabled for the selected element.
Please enter a character. If you want to enter more than one character, please use the LaTeX code editor.
To exit the editing mode, click the button below or press ESC/Enter.

ERRORS.TRY_AGAIN:
Try again after {{time}}.
If you don't want to wait, please log in using the buttons above.
ERRORS.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

CANVAS.FEATURE_DISABLED: This functionality is not supported in the current version of the product.

PROCESSING.MESSAGE_1: Your task is being processed, please wait…
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_3: We’re working on your solution, it’ll be ready soon
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_5: Your solution is on the way, just a moment…
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_6: Hang on, we’re calculating your answer!
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_7: The system is solving your task, stay tuned…
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_8: Almost done! Your solution will appear shortly.
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_9: Working hard on your solution — don’t go anywhere!
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_10: Patience! Your task is being solved right now.
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_11: Your task is in the works — just a few seconds…
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_12: We’re putting together your solution… hang tight!
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_13: Calculating… your answer is on its way!
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_14: Sit tight! We’re processing your task right now.
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_15: Hold on, the solution is almost ready…
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_16: Crunching numbers… your task will be ready soon!
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_17: We’re getting your solution ready, stay tuned!
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_18: Almost there! The system is finalizing your answer.
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_19: Processing in progress… your task will appear shortly.
PROCESSING.MESSAGE_20: Hang tight, the solution is being generated right now.

HINT.NOTCONTAINSEMAIL: The password must not contain an email address

USERNAME.INVALID: Username must be 4-24 characters long, start with a letter, and contain only letters and numbers.

EMAIL.NOT_ALLOWED: Registration is only allowed with email addresses from approved providers.
EMAIL.TOO_LONG: Email address is too long. Maximum allowed length is 80 characters.

FAIL.DATA: Incorrect data. Check information and try again.
FAIL.CAPTCHA: The "I'm not a robot" check failed.
FAIL.UNKNOWN: An unknown error occurred. Try again later.

EMAILPASS.REQUIRED: Email and password are required for login.

FAIL.DATA: Incorrect data. Check information and try again.
FAIL.CAPTCHA: The "I'm not a robot" check failed.
FAIL.UNKNOWN: An unknown error occurred. Try again later.
FAIL.USERNOTFOUND: User not found. Check information and try again.
FAIL.NOTACTIVE: Please activate your account by following the link sent to your email.

RECOVER.SUCCESS: Password recovery email has been sent.
RECOVER.FAIL: Error sending recovery email. Please try again.

CODE.INVALID_SESSION: Session expired. Please log in again.
CODE.UNKNOWN: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

CODE_INPUT.EMAIL: Enter the code sent to your email
CODE_INPUT.GAUTH: Enter the code from your authenticator app

SETTINGS.UNAUTHORIZED_MESSAGE: You don’t have permission to access this content.
SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings

MODE.IP_ONLY: Ask only on new device / IP

ERROR.CURRENT_DEVICE: You cannot disable your current device.
ERROR.OTHER: An error occurred during the operation. Please try again later.

BAN.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to block the user

ACTIVE.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to activate token

CHART.TITLE: Number of registrations for the period

LANGUAGE.TEMPORARY_MESSAGE: The selected language is temporary. You can change the default language in settings.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Email confirmation
CONFIRM.SUCCESS: Your email has been successfully confirmed.
CONFIRM.ALREADY_USED: This confirmation link has already been used.
CONFIRM.NEW_LINK_SENT: The confirmation link has expired. A new one has been sent to your email.
CONFIRM.ERROR: An error occurred during email confirmation.
CONFIRM.CAPTCHA_REQUIRED: Please complete the CAPTCHA to proceed.

RECOVERY.TITLE: Password Recovery
RECOVERY.CAPTCHA_REQUIRED: Please complete the CAPTCHA to continue.
RECOVERY.INVALID_PASSWORD: The password you entered is invalid.

MESSAGE.SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully changed!
MESSAGE.FAIL: Failed to change the password. Please try again.
MESSAGE.USER_NOT_FOUND: User with this recovery token was not found.
MESSAGE.USED_TOKEN: This recovery link has already been used.
MESSAGE.ERROR: An unexpected error occurred during password recovery.
